title: Iran Launches About 180 Ballistic Missiles at Israel
content: Many of the missiles were intercepted with the help of the United States, but some fell in central and southern Israel, the Israeli military said. Israel vowed to retaliate.

title: Lebanon’s Government, Crippled by Years of Crises, Is Ill-Prepared for Escalation
